languages.text: {n}Голос священника трескуч и резок, но вам все же удается уловить странное изменение интонации. Что-то скрывается за переменой в его речи — что-то, о чем старец не счел нужным рассказывать.{/n}

{n}The priest's voice is rasping and harsh, but you still manage to pick up a strange change in tone. There is something hidden behind this shift in his speech — something that he did not consider necessary to explain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Голос священника трескуч и резок, но вам все же удается уловить странное изменение интонации. Что-то скрывается за переменой в его речи — что-то, о чем старец не счел нужным рассказывать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The priest's voice is rasping and harsh, but you still manage to pick up a strange change in tone. There is something hidden behind this shift in his speech — something that he did not consider necessary to explain.{/n}

{n}The priest's voice is rasping and harsh, but you still manage to pick up a strange change in tone. There is something hidden behind this shift in his speech — something that he did not consider necessary to explain.{/n}

{n}The priest's voice is rasping and harsh, but you still manage to pick up a strange change in tone. There is something hidden behind this shift in his speech — something that he did not consider necessary to explain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}牧师的声音又嘶哑又刺耳，但你还是听出来，他的语气中带着某种古怪的变化。这种变化背后隐藏着某些东西，某些他认为没必要解释的东西。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest's voice is rasping and harsh, but you still manage to pick up a strange change in tone. There is something hidden behind this shift in his speech — something that he did not consider necessary to explain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师的声音又嘶哑又刺耳，但你还是听出来，他的语气中带着某种古怪的变化。这种变化背后隐藏着某些东西，某些他认为没必要解释的东西。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La voz del sacerdote carraspea y denota rigurosidad, hasta que notas cierta variación en su tono. Ese cambio en el discurso oculta algo, pero no parece que considere necesario explicarlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest's voice is rasping and harsh, but you still manage to pick up a strange change in tone. There is something hidden behind this shift in his speech — something that he did not consider necessary to explain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del sacerdote carraspea y denota rigurosidad, hasta que notas cierta variación en su tono. Ese cambio en el discurso oculta algo, pero no parece que considere necesario explicarlo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}司祭の声は荒々しく厳しいが、それでも奇妙な口調の変化を感じ取ることができた。彼自身が説明するまでもないと思っている何かが、彼の声の変化の奥に隠されている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest's voice is rasping and harsh, but you still manage to pick up a strange change in tone. There is something hidden behind this shift in his speech — something that he did not consider necessary to explain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}司祭の声は荒々しく厳しいが、それでも奇妙な口調の変化を感じ取ることができた。彼自身が説明するまでもないと思っている何かが、彼の声の変化の奥に隠されている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Priesters ist rau und abweisend, aber dennoch nimmst du eine seltsame Veränderung in seinem Ton wahr. Hinter diesem Wechsel verbirgt sich etwas – und es zu erklären, hielt er wohl nicht für erforderlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest's voice is rasping and harsh, but you still manage to pick up a strange change in tone. There is something hidden behind this shift in his speech — something that he did not consider necessary to explain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Priesters ist rau und abweisend, aber dennoch nimmst du eine seltsame Veränderung in seinem Ton wahr. Hinter diesem Wechsel verbirgt sich etwas – und es zu erklären, hielt er wohl nicht für erforderlich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La voix du prêtre est rauque et dure, mais vous détectez tout de même un étrange changement dans son ton. Cela cache quelque chose... quelque chose qu'il ne juge pas nécessaire d'expliquer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest's voice is rasping and harsh, but you still manage to pick up a strange change in tone. There is something hidden behind this shift in his speech — something that he did not consider necessary to explain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du prêtre est rauque et dure, mais vous détectez tout de même un étrange changement dans son ton. Cela cache quelque chose... quelque chose qu'il ne juge pas nécessaire d'expliquer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rahibin sesi hırıltılı ve kulak tırmalayıcı çıksa da tonundaki tuhaf değişimi fark edebiliyorsun. Konuşmasındaki bu değişimin ardında gizli bir şeyler yatıyor. Açıklamaya gerek görmediği şeyler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The priest's voice is rasping and harsh, but you still manage to pick up a strange change in tone. There is something hidden behind this shift in his speech — something that he did not consider necessary to explain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Rahibin sesi hışırtılı ve sert ama yine de ses tonundaki tuhaf bir değişimi fark etmeyi başarıyorsun. Konuşmasındaki bu değişimin arkasında yatan gizli bir şeyler var. Açıklamaya gerek görmediği bir şeyler.{/n}
